ygData.subject: Re: Out gunned
ygData.msgSnippet: ... As always, people forget to ask how much mana it takes and how long it takes. I m sure if you went head to head with the cleric, you d out damage him. It
ygData.messageBody:
Gregory Egan wrote:
>
> From: "Gregory Egan" <gemd@...>
>
> Hi all,
>
> I thought wizards were supposed to be masters of DD spells. I was with a
> level 29 cleric recently, and he has a spell (wrath) which was doing 198
> damage to my 178. Granted, I am level 27, but was still kind of shocked.

As always, people forget to ask how much mana it takes and how long it
takes. I'm sure if you went head to head with the cleric, you'd out
damage him.

It
> was only a two level difference,

Yeah, it's a level difference where the levels are separated by a spell
level gap. If you'd compare a 19 wiz to a 20 wiz you'd see a big
difference too. Wow, it's only one level, right? Well, when it is a
spell level it's not the same.

--
Sergey
